title: Popcorn Time release 0.3.8 all
description:
09 Jul 2015

Popcorn Time release 0.3.8
No, but really... There's nothing on TV.

The 0.3.8 update is finally out! It's been a long time coming and we know you've all been patiently waiting for it. All your waiting paid off, because this update is a massive one and comes with a ton of fixes.

This update is way too big to add every change into this blog post itself, so follow this link for the complete changelog with all the new bug fixes and features this time around.

Notable Bug Fixes

Fix Movies listing
Fix most issues with remotes
Fix Trakt.tv
Many missing subtitles are now available
Notable Features

NodeWebkit 12 (nw.js 12)
Remember last chosen settings for things like Player Volume, Subtitles Position, and Quality
Translated Movies & TV Show synopsis
1080p TV Shows
Play local video files
Trending categories
"Random" movie button
